TopicTitle: How to access the autosave file?

Articles.Content:
Hi all, how do you access the autosave file?

I pulled a bonehead move and lost a bunch of progress I made last night!

Gent

Edited February 13, 2015 by Gent Harris
It's the one called persistent.sfs. But that's where your game state is saved. If you want to go back to an earlier state, you need a quicksave.

Thanks that's what I thought, I'm screwed LOL

Gent
For future reference, you can make named quicksaves during play by using Alt+F5.

For future reference, you can make named quicksaves during play by using Alt+F5.

...Just don't press Alt + F4 by accident.
Alternately, install S.A.V.E., or Kerbal Alarm Clock, or use the backup feature of your operating system (previous versions tab in Win7, TimeCapsule I guess in OS X).
